subject: Documentary Films and Programs
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The filmmaker Ken Burns is taking another swing at baseball, chronicling the sport over the past 15 years in “The Tenth Inning.” It will be broadcast in the spring of 2010, PBS announced. The film will feature interviews with managers Felipe Alou and Joe Torre, the players Omar Vizquel and Ichiro Suzuki and fans from across the country and overseas.
